Articles.Content:
Hey,

So I was trying yesterday to use MechJeb's Maneuver Node Editor by changing some values, and I noticed something strange. When I typed numbers in the input boxes of the dialog, things worked fine. When I wanted to backspace or delete stuff from the input box, that worked, but those keys also performed their primary function in the same time (reset focus and docking view, respectively). This led to much hilarity, especially when I tried to input decimal numbers, which use '.' and I warped.

Am I doing something wrong, or is this a known issue of some kind with MechJeb?

It's a known Unity feature. Nothing that Mechjeb devs can do until Squad fix that in their input loop.

Edited April 25, 2013 by macbernick
Try maybe using the numpad? Should at least prevent you from time warping.
Assuming his computer has a numpad, that's the trick. Or remapping bothering keys.
